title: GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS
content:
0x9E6B70061662AE5C0x4E372FE2// GetRelationshipBetweenGroups
int GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(Hash group1, Hash group2);Gets the relationship between two groups. This should be called twice (once for each group).  
Relationship types:  
0 = Companion  
1 = Respect  
2 = Like  
3 = Neutral  
4 = Dislike  
5 = Hate  
255 = Pedestrians  
Example:  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(l_1017, 0xA49E591C);  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(0xA49E591C, l_1017);
codeBlocks:
// GetRelationshipBetweenGroups
int GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(Hash group1, Hash group2);

Gets the relationship between two groups. This should be called twice (once for each group).  
Relationship types:  
0 = Companion  
1 = Respect  
2 = Like  
3 = Neutral  
4 = Dislike  
5 = Hate  
255 = Pedestrians  
Example:  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(l_1017, 0xA49E591C);  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(0xA49E591C, l_1017);
